trustfund:
TF053537-PHRD-VIETNAM: SECOND PAYMENT
            SYSTEM AND THE BANK MODERNIZATION PROJECT,TF090325-PHRD VIETNAM: SECOND PAYMENT
            SYSTEM AND BANK MODERNIZATION IMPLEMENTATI
theme: Other financial and private sector development,International financial standards and systems

abstracts.cdata!:
The results profile talks about finance,
            banking, and payment services of Vietnam. The Second Payment
            System and Bank Modernization Project (PSBM2) significantly
            improved the speed and reliability of interbank payments in
            Vietnam from two weeks in 2005 to within the day, with
            exponential growth of financial transactions nationwide. The
            participating banks settled customer fund transfers within
            minutes as compared to days in 2004-05. Centralized funds
            and customer management strengthened project entities’ risk
            management capacity. Several banks can offer eBanking
            services to customers now (159,000 eBanking customers and
            412,360 instant messaging customers).The PSBM2 brought about
            several verifiable economic benefits in the development of a
            modern financial sector infrastructure, access to finance
            and improved banking operations. Based on the positive
            experience of the two PSBM projects, the government has
            recently adopted a strategy to promote a non-cash economy in
            Vietnam to further develop financial sector infrastructure
            and improve access to finance.
